name: G.E.O. JOE
description:
Entry for SDL Enthusiasts 1k members GameJam

Build, calculate, and shoot! G.E.O. JOE features puzzles where you modify the environment to help you complete them. Buy tiles from the store, place them where necessary, and see if you can hit the goal! Featuring 10 unique puzzles to play, 4k support, and support for editing level files.

Source code can be found here.

NOTE: Mac support (potentially) coming soon
